summary:
Izuku: katchan, when I die, I don’t care who else is at the funeral, as long as you're there. 
Katsuku: Of course I'll be there....
body:
Izuku: katchan, when I die, I don’t care who else is at the funeral, as long as you’re there.

Katsuku: Of course I’ll be there. The murderer always shows up to throw off the cops.

reblog.comment:
Izuku: katchan, when I die, I don’t care who else is at the funeral, as long as you’re there.

Katsuku: Of course I’ll be there. The murderer always shows up to throw off the cops.

blog.name: incorrectbnhaquotes
blog.title: season 3 amirite
blog.description: things that were 100% definitely said in boku no hero academia. not spoiler free. tracking the tag #incorrectbnhaquotes. submissions open!

summary:
Kaminari: Women are so mysterious.
Jirou: You’re a prick.
Kaminari: Another riddle.
body:
Kaminari: Women are so mysterious.
Jirou: You’re a prick.
Kaminari: Another riddle.

Deku Headcanon

Deku is stupid good at editing. Why? Because he’s made so many fan edits, fan made music videos and all that kind of shit and you can’t tell me that he hasn’t made a music video of All Might to Glitter and Gold.

reblog.comment:
Deku Headcanon

Deku is stupid good at editing. Why? Because he’s made so many fan edits, fan made music videos and all that kind of shit and you can’t tell me that he hasn’t made a music video of All Might to Glitter and Gold.

trail.content_raw:
Deku Headcanon

Deku is stupid good at editing. Why? Because he’s made so many fan edits, fan made music videos and all that kind of shit and you can’t tell me that he hasn’t made a music video of All Might to Glitter and Gold.
trail.content:
Deku Headcanon

Deku is stupid good at editing. Why? Because he’s made so many fan edits, fan made music videos and all that kind of shit and you can’t tell me that he hasn’t made a music video of All Might to Glitter and Gold.

blog.name: faketextsfromlastmight
blog.title: Fake texts from last Might
blog.description: Things BNHA characters most definitely never said (sadly).

summary:
Ashido Mina : So! The million-dollars question... Bakugou: are you gay?
Bakugou Katsuki : After a long period of soul-searching,...
body:
Ashido Mina : So! The million-dollars question... Bakugou: are you gay?
Bakugou Katsuki : After a long period of soul-searching, I've more or less come to the conclusion that I'm a gay asexual.
Sero Hanta : Goddamnit. I thought I told Kirishima not to wish on that monkey's paw.

dialogue.name: Ashido Mina
dialogue.label: Ashido Mina :
dialogue.phrase: So! The million-dollars question... Bakugou: are you gay?

dialogue.name: Bakugou Katsuki
dialogue.label: Bakugou Katsuki :
dialogue.phrase: After a long period of soul-searching, I've more or less come to the conclusion that I'm a gay asexual.

dialogue.name: Sero Hanta
dialogue.label: Sero Hanta :
dialogue.phrase: Goddamnit. I thought I told Kirishima not to wish on that monkey's paw.
